pr_title: JDK15 fillInStackTrace set skipCount to 1 for non-NPE cases

timeline.message:
JDK15 fillInStackTrace set skipCount to 1 for non-NPE cases

Add back `walkState->skipCount = 1` for non-NPE cases.

Signed-off-by: Jason Feng <fengj@ca.ibm.com>

JDK15 fillInStackTrace set skipCount to 1 for non-NPE cases

Add back `walkState->skipCount = 1` for non-NPE cases.

Signed-off-by: Jason Feng <fengj@ca.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: @gacholio did you mean this variable declaration? it is within a .cpp file and not required to be declared at beginning of the scope.
timeline.author: JasonFengJ9

replies.bodyText: You are correct - the C change still has the scope, which I missed.
replies.author: gacholio
